_source.short_desc: Paylocity's comprehensive product suite delivers a unified platform for professionals to make strategic HR and payroll decisions!
_source.long_desc: Paylocity's comprehensive product suite delivers a unified platform for professionals to make strategic decisions in the areas of benefits, core HR, payroll, talent, and workforce management, while cultivating a modern workplace and improving employee engagement. The platform can be accessed 24*7 from any given location using the mobile application.
_source.target_audience: Web-based payroll and HCM solution that helps small to large enterprises manage and track employees' compensation, deductions, benefits, time-off requests, retirement plans, engagement and more.

media.caption: Paylocity's Compliance Dashboard will change the way you view compliance. Through its intuitive interface, stay on track with your company's data completeness and visualized important employee compliance items, all in one place.

Employees want secure and easy access to their information, 24/7. With Employee Self Service (ESS), they can view checks, request time off, clock in and out, update personal data, and interact with each other.

Paylocity's unified dashboard shows you how well you're doing with step-by-step ways to improve. See your overall score and compare your performance to peers - then, breakdown results across utilization, employee sentiment, and organizational health.

Our Workforce Management tool helps get you out of juggling spreadsheets, bulletin boards, and multiple emails. Eliminate unplanned labor costs, minimize compliance risks, and deliver a mobile and connected experience for on-the-go managers and employees.

Flexible Benefits, made to order. Administer third-party benefit services like FSAs, HSAs, TMAs, and COBRA with ease. Supplement your standard plans with complementary programs, giving your employees the benefits options they need.

category_features.name: 401(k) Tracking
category_features.definition: Track 401(k) participant contributions and employer match

category_features.name: Benefits Management
category_features.definition: Record employee's benefit plans and selections throughout career progression

category_features.name: Check Printing
category_features.definition: Print paychecks

category_features.name: Direct Deposit
category_features.definition: Digitally deposit correct payroll amounts into individual worker bank accounts

category_features.name: Multi-Country
category_features.definition: Pay employees in multiple countries using correct currencies and correct tax deduction amounts

category_features.name: Multi-State
category_features.definition: Pay employees in multiple states with correct tax deduction amounts in each

category_features.name: Payroll Outsourcing
category_features.definition: Delegate payroll processing to third party vendors

category_features.name: Payroll Reporting
category_features.definition: View and track metrics such as payslips, salary and benefits statements, etc.

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Tax Compliance
category_features.definition: Track tax-related transactions, tax remittance and tax reporting for various groups of employees and contractors

category_features.name: Vacation/Leave Tracking
category_features.definition: Request, track, and manage time off requests and vacation time

category_features.name: W-2 Preparation
category_features.definition: Automatically create and distribute W-2/1099 tax forms to employees.

category_features.name: Wage Garnishment
category_features.definition: Automatically subtract garnishments from wages

category_features.name: 360 Degree Feedback
category_features.definition: A process in which an employee receives feedback and a full analysis of how their peers, managers, and direct reports perceive them.

category_features.name: Applicant Tracking
category_features.definition: Find and manage potential candidates and their applications and resumes through the recruiting life cycle

category_features.name: Benefits Management
category_features.definition: Record employee's benefit plans and selections throughout career progression

category_features.name: Compensation Management
category_features.definition: Organize and track payroll, bonuses, and additional company benefits and perks distributed to each employee

category_features.name: Employee Database
category_features.definition: Electronic storage of staff contact information and job status

category_features.name: Employee Profiles
category_features.definition: Create and view customizable employee profiles to track important information (e.g. job title, manager, contact info, etc.).

category_features.name: Onboarding
category_features.definition: Process of familiarizing new stakeholders with the company, a new location, or a service

category_features.name: Payroll Management
category_features.definition: Track and process employee payroll (salaries, wages, etc.)

category_features.name: Performance Management
category_features.definition: Organize and manage the accomplishments and development of employees

category_features.name: Recruitment Management
category_features.definition: Tools to find, attract and asses potential candidates for open job positions within a company

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Time & Attendance
category_features.definition: Track and manage employee's work hours to improve payroll accuracy

category_features.name: Time Off Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage employee time-off, vacation, and sick leave requests

related_products.short_desc: ADP Workforce Now is a human capital management solution for companies with more than 50 employees.
related_products.features:
The core capabilities of the solution are human resources management, payroll, benefits, talent management, compliance, time & labor management, analytics & benchmarking. 
The fully integrated suite is built on a single database, which automates data synchronization across different components and helps users to minimize manual administrative tasks. The platform also integrates with other HR and business applications via the ADP Marketplace and APIs.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks Online is a small business accounting software and app that allows you to manage your business anywhere, anytime.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Online is a small business accounting software and app that allows you to manage your business anywhere, anytime. Used by over 4.5 million customers, QuickBooks provides smart tools for your business, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage expenses, send invoices, track inventory, and even run payroll. With QuickBooks Online, you can get organized, save time, and even get paid fast by adding payment features. Best of all, you can try it for free for 30 days.

related_products.short_desc: Gusto is the all-in-one HR platform for growing businesses-one place to hire, pay, insure, and manage your hardworking team.
related_products.features:
With over a decade of experience, Gusto provides award-winning, all-in-one payroll for businesses of all sizes. With Gusto's streamlined platform, payroll takes just a few clicks. You get unlimited payroll runs, your payroll taxes are automatically filed for you, and you even get help with compliance.

There's a reason more than 200,000 businesses trust Gusto with their payroll needs. In fact, 85% of surveyed customers say Gusto is easier to use than their last payroll provider.

related_products.short_desc: Online payroll solutions for small business owners. Run payroll in 3 easy steps.Low pricing with no surprise fees. Try it free!
related_products.features:
Best in value, user-friendly, value for money, and customer service according to users over the competition. Made for USA  small business owners with 1-100 employees. Choose the payroll option right for you:
Basic Payroll - base price $10/mo. + $4 per employee.
Full Service Payroll - Base price $30/mo + $4 per employee.  You run payroll, but let us handle the payroll tax filings.
Free direct deposit, or print paychecks.

related_products.short_desc: Streamline HR and payroll processes and get fast access to employee data using one intuitive platform. Get 3 Months Free Payroll*!
related_products.features: Paycor empowers leaders to modernize every aspect of people management so they can focus on what really matters: building winning teams. Processing payroll and managing tax compliance can be a time-consuming task for your team. But with Paycor, businesses can pay employees quickly and confidently from anywhere. Key features include general ledger integration, OnDemand Pay, AutoRun functionality, employee self-service, powerful reporting tools and compliance expertise. Get 3 Months Free Payroll*!

related_products.short_desc: BambooHR makes running payroll easy, quick, and stress-free by offering a single source of data, a comprehensive payroll solution.
related_products.features: Instead of spending hours each month manually transferring data and worrying about accuracy, BambooHR makes running your payroll easy, quick, and stress-free. Data updates in BambooHR automatically flow into payroll to virtually eliminate data double entry. And with comprehensive payroll reporting, superior customer support, and full-service tax filing, you'll save time and worry on payroll-setting you free to focus on other important initiatives.

related_products.short_desc: Rippling is the #1 Rated Payroll & HR software. Easily manage your Payroll, Benefits, Compliance, and more--all in one, modern system.
related_products.features: Rippling is The #1 Rated Payroll & HR Software. You can onboard new hires in 90 seconds, run payroll with a click, and pay employees or contractors, anywhere. And with Rippling, you can also manage your people's offer letters, I-9's, health insurance, time off, and more -- 100% online and paperlessly. All in one, modern platform.

related_products.short_desc: Hubstaff has payroll, invoicing, reporting, scheduling, and more. No credit card is required. Start a free trial today!
related_products.features: Improve payment inefficiency with Hubstaff. Manage payroll, reporting, scheduling, and more through one dashboard. Hubstaff integrates with over 30 apps so your business can run more efficiently, including Paypal, Wise, Payoneer, Quickbooks, Gusto, and more. Start automating and sending payments in a snap with Hubstaff. Available for Mac, Windows, Linux, iOS & Android.

related_products.short_desc: Manage payroll, online or in-house, and save money on time tracking, reports, and processing payroll.
related_products.features: Paychex Flex is an all-in-one Payroll & HR solution that you can build on as your business grows or changes. Use it to run payroll and integrate your HR administration, retirement, and insurance management with service the way you want it and our expert knowledge of the regulations that could affect your business. Get 3 months of free payroll processing for a limited time. Click the link to get the details.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based human resources solution that helps businesses streamline workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes.
related_products.features: Workday HCM is a single, cloud-based solution for workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes. The solution is used by Fortune 500 and G2k companies to operate with agility and efficiency, and for organizations to be ready for whatever comes next. Unlike rigid HR systems or point solutions, Workday HCM delivers a skills-based HCM foundation and continuously innovates to enable customer success as the impact of technology, alternative work arrangements, and employee expectations evolve.

related_products.short_desc: The smarter way for a small business to manage an hourly team. Time clocks, scheduling, payroll, messaging, and HR all in one.
related_products.features:
Homebase makes work easier for 100,000+ small (but
mighty) businesses with everything they need to
manage and pay an hourly team: employee scheduling, time clocks, payroll, team communication, hiring, onboarding, and compliance. 
 
Just don't call us "Human Capital Management." We're tools built for the busiest businesses, so owners and employees can spend less time on paperwork and more time on what matters. 

Learn more at joinhomebase.com.

similar_products.short_desc:
Payroll and compliance built for the worldwide workforce.
Pay your team with one-click payments and let Deel handle taxes and benefits.
similar_products.features:
Deel is global payroll and compliant hiring built for remote teams, where anyone, anywhere can get hired and paid. Instantly hire full-time employees or independent contractors across the world legally, in minutes. 

With Deel, companies take care of payroll and create localized legal contracts in over 150 countries using a tech-enabled self-serve process.

Deel serves more than 4,500 customers, from SMBs to publicly traded companies.

similar_products.short_desc: Set up your whole team: employees, contractors, or both with Square Payroll.
similar_products.features: Payroll has never been easier with Square Payroll. Square handles your federal and state payroll taxes including withholdings, payments, and filings. Small businesses and large companies can easily pay both hourly and salaried employees. Set your sick leave or paid time off policy for each team member, and Square's online payroll services take care of the rest. Switching providers is also simple - tell us your current provider, upload existing reports, and we take care of the rest.

similar_products.short_desc: Online payroll solutions for small business owners. Run payroll in 3 easy steps.Low pricing with no surprise fees. Try it free!
similar_products.features:
Best in value, user-friendly, value for money, and customer service according to users over the competition. Made for USA  small business owners with 1-100 employees. Choose the payroll option right for you:
Basic Payroll - base price $10/mo. + $4 per employee.
Full Service Payroll - Base price $30/mo + $4 per employee.  You run payroll, but let us handle the payroll tax filings.
Free direct deposit, or print paychecks.

similar_products.short_desc: Papaya's payroll automation promotes scalability, compliance, accuracy, and security. It delivers unprecedented visibility & control.
similar_products.features:
Papaya's cloud-based SaaS platform automates global payroll end-to-end - from people to payroll to payments - in over 160 countries. Companies can upgrade their outdated legacy payroll software to Papaya's groundbreaking platform without ripping and replacing their network of local partners.
Papaya can integrate with the companies' network in one payroll cycle. All payroll data is automatically verified though built-in compliance and accuracy engines to ensure a perfect payroll every time.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage and pay global contractors and employees with just a few clicks in our easy-to-use global HR and payroll platform.
similar_products.features: Remote makes it easy to run a remote global organization. Our simple yet powerful platform lets you go from getting salary estimates to issuing your first payslip in just a few clicks. Plus, our streamlined documentation, time off requests, and approval systems keep payroll management simple so you can focus on growing your business.

similar_products.short_desc: HR/Payroll solution that processes payroll, employee onboarding/management, payroll/tax compliance, payroll reports, benefits, and more
similar_products.features:
Cloud9HR Software is designed for easy navigation and daily use ranging from employee onboarding/management to payroll and supporting reports. With 25 years of Payroll an HR experience we made this software easy to use to achieve accurate payroll and tax compliance for novice to very experienced administrators, PEO's and business owners.  Cloud9HR is for companies that are US based with 1 or more W2 employees.  It supports 1099.  
You will be supported by a team of responsive usage experts.

similar_products.short_desc: Atlas spans all aspects of human experience management, so you can fast-track global ambition and simplify HR set-up.
similar_products.features: Atlas enables innovative companies to compete in a global economy, believing that businesses should employ whomever they want, wherever the talent exists. As the largest Direct Employer of Record (EOR), Atlas is a technology platform that is supported by experts and delivers flexibility for companies to expand across borders, onboard talent, manage compliance, and pay their global workforce without the need for a local entity or multiple third-party providers.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Attendance Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Attendance Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Attendance Tracking software helps organizations manage the whereabouts of their employees. These applications track an employee's vacation time off, sick time off, overtime, and absences. The software also searches for patterns in absences. Attendance Tracking software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, and Time Clock software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Benefits Administration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Benefits Administration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Benefits Administration software helps HR professionals organize employee information for medical, dental, 401K, disability and retirement benefits. This software helps ensure compliance with benefit eligibility and COBRA standards, and tracks benefit spending for companies in nearly any industry. These solutions also include benefit statement software and benefit plan software. Benefits Administration software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Compensation Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Compensation Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Compensation Management software helps organizations improve employees' motivation and retention by structuring performance-based benefits, streamlining payment adjustments across the company and tracking compensation payouts. Compensation Management software is related to Talent Management software, Performance Appraisal software, Commission software and Payroll software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workforce Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workforce Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workforce Management software enables organizations to plan, track, and manage the allocation and requirements of labor resources. Workforce Management solutions also help organizations develop and retain top talent. These applications allow businesses to optimize staff scheduling, while reducing labor costs. Workforce Management software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, Scheduling software and Time Clock software.

category_features.name: 360 Degree Feedback
category_features.definition: A process in which an employee receives feedback and a full analysis of how their peers, managers, and direct reports perceive them.

category_features.name: Compensation Management
category_features.definition: Organize and track payroll, bonuses, and additional company benefits and perks distributed to each employee

category_features.name: Customizable Templates
category_features.definition: Create, save, and re-purpose formatting

category_features.name: Customization
category_features.definition: Customize the levels of performance/achievement (i.e. numeric or alphabetic)

category_features.name: Individual Development Plans
category_features.definition: Document completed by employee to assist with career and personal development to reach short term and long term goals

category_features.name: On-going Performance Tracking
category_features.definition: Organize real time feedback and assessments on employees' skills and accomplishments to determine promotions or performance plans

category_features.name: Peer Appraisals
category_features.definition: Peer/teammate feedback and review on individual's performance

category_features.name: Review Cycle Tracking
category_features.definition: Follow the progression of a task associated with performance reviews

category_features.name: Self Assessment
category_features.definition: An individual's evaluation of his or her own strengths, weaknesses, and skills

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Skills Assessment
category_features.definition: Observe employees over a period of time to gain an understanding of their abilities to perform certain tasks

category_features.name: Weighted Performance Measures
category_features.definition: Assess skills, outcomes and results using preset metrics and averages

category_features.name: ACA Reporting
category_features.definition: Collect data and compile reports to stay in compliance with Affordable Care Act requirements

category_features.name: Benefits Administration Outsourcing
category_features.definition: Delegate benefits administration to third party vendors

category_features.name: Benefits Dashboard
category_features.definition: Visualize benefits that employees selected for themselves or that is on offer by an employer

category_features.name: COBRA Administration
category_features.definition: Manage mandated benefit continuation for employees that no longer work for the company but chose to remain on the company plan

category_features.name: Deduction Management
category_features.definition: Determine what amounts employees should contribute towards their benefits from each paycheck

category_features.name: Disability Insurance Administration
category_features.definition: Set up and manage short and/or long term disability insurance benefits

category_features.name: Employee Benefits Administration
category_features.definition: Manage benefit portfolio selection that is available to your employees through workplace and automate related administrative tasks

category_features.name: FMLA Administration
category_features.definition: Set up and manage benefits mandated by family and medical act

category_features.name: HIPAA Compliant
category_features.definition: Compliant with HIPAA, which sets standards for sensitive patient data protection

category_features.name: HSA/FSA Administration
category_features.definition: Set up and manage health savings and flexible spending accounts for your employees

category_features.name: Health Insurance Administration
category_features.definition: Set up and manage health insurance benefits for employees

category_features.name: Life Insurance Administration
category_features.definition: Set up and manage life insurance benefits for your employees

category_features.name: Online Benefits Enrollment
category_features.definition: Select benefits and provide information needed to participate in a benefit via an online portal

category_features.name: Provider Management
category_features.definition: Chose benefit providers and track their information, such as rates and contract terms, as well as renewal offerings

category_features.name: Retirement Plan Management
category_features.definition: Set up and manage retirement benefits for your employees

category_features.name: Benchmarking
category_features.definition: Compare key metrics for the business against prominent players in the industry

category_features.name: Employee Recognition
category_features.definition: Acknowledge and reward employees for reaching specific goals and/or for exemplary performance.

category_features.name: Goal Management
category_features.definition: Allows employees to set and manage work or career related goals.

category_features.name: Negative Feedback Management
category_features.definition: Identify, track, and respond to negative feedback

category_features.name: Performance Management
category_features.definition: Organize and manage the accomplishments and development of employees

category_features.name: Pulse Surveys
category_features.definition: Surveys sent out at regularly scheduled intervals to track important metrics like job satisfaction, work environment, etc.

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.definition: Verify the identity and employment authorization of individuals hired for employment in the United States

category_features.definition: Sign a document within the system

category_features.definition: Create, share, and manage the distribution of job descriptions/duties

category_features.definition: Create,assign and specify order of tasks to be completed in order to prepare a new hire for his job role

category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.definition: Track employee's progression through training programs

category_features.definition: Organize and track payroll, bonuses, and additional company benefits and perks distributed to each employee

category_features.definition: Catalog, manage, and develop employee skill sets

category_features.definition: Establish measurable goals and objectives to be tracked and reviewed within a specific time frame

category_features.name: Training Management

category_features.definition: Automate recording of time to reduce human error

category_features.name: Billable & Non-Billable Hours
category_features.definition: Track billable hours and/or non billable expenses related to work performed

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Employee Database
category_features.definition: Electronic storage of staff contact information and job status

category_features.definition: Track the time and location worked by employees via mobile device

category_features.name: Multiple Billing Rates
category_features.definition: Different tiers of pricing and billing for different employees and situations

category_features.name: Offline Time Tracking
category_features.definition: Track employee and task times without internet connection

category_features.name: Overtime Calculation
category_features.definition: Manage and record overtime hours for hourly employees

category_features.name: Timesheet Management
category_features.definition: Track the amount of time spent on a job or task

category_features.name: Vacation/Leave Tracking
category_features.definition: Request, track, and manage time off requests and vacation time

category_features.definition: Track actual spending to ensure it's in line with the budget and estimate future finances

category_features.definition: Track & manage required documents and health and safety, insurance, and training information for hired contractors

category_features.definition: Tools, processes, and management that support the experience of employees throughout their time at a company

category_features.definition: A set of indicators that tracks how well an organization, a division, or a particular project are performing

category_features.name: Recruitment Management
category_features.definition: Tools to find, attract and asses potential candidates for open job positions within a company

category_features.name: Skills Tracking
category_features.definition: Track employee skills, competencies, training & qualifications

category_features.name: Time & Attendance
category_features.definition: Track and manage employee's work hours to improve payroll accuracy

category_features.name: Variable Workforce
category_features.definition: Utilize third party services to cover unforeseen labor needs

related_products.short_desc: ADP Workforce Now is a human capital management solution for companies with more than 50 employees.
related_products.features:
The core capabilities of the solution are human resources management, payroll, benefits, talent management, compliance, time & labor management, analytics & benchmarking. 
The fully integrated suite is built on a single database, which automates data synchronization across different components and helps users to minimize manual administrative tasks. The platform also integrates with other HR and business applications via the ADP Marketplace and APIs.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: Improve your HR processes by building custom workflows on monday.com for your employee performance reviews using our advanced forms.
related_products.features: Improve your HR processes by building custom workflows on monday.com for your employee performance reviews using our advanced forms. In fact, you can manage your entire employee life cycle on this flexible platform. Simply start with one of our ready-made templates and create recruitment pipelines, employee onboarding tools, and engagement surveys all with a few clicks. Then automate your workflows so you can stop working on manual work, and focus on tasks that really make a difference.

related_products.short_desc: The award-winning BambooHR Performance Management makes performance reviews a pain-free experience.
related_products.features: The award-winning BambooHR Performance Management makes performance reviews a pain-free experience by modernizing the review process and focusing on a continuous feedback approach. Discover the new way of doing Performance Management by utilizing multiple review cycles, custom questions, employee-specific goals, confidential feedback, impromptu assessments, and reporting that provides powerful, real-time insights into your top performers, struggling employees, and employee/manager misalignments.

related_products.short_desc: Motivosity is an employee engagement platform that helps people be more motivated at work.
related_products.features: Motivosity is a modern employee engagement software with the mission to make people happier at work. Our platform focuses on three of the top drivers of employee satisfaction: feeling appreciated for your work, being part of a community, and having a meaningful relationship with your manager. With an average 95% user engagement rate, our software drives amazing results by making consistent recognition a part of your culture and making visible all the great work your team members are doing.

related_products.short_desc: 15Five is a people and performance platform that instantly upgrades each and every manager.
related_products.features: 15Five is a people and performance platform that instantly upgrades each and every manager. It works by combining employee engagement, continuous performance management, and manager effectiveness software with education, services, and community. At the heart of our approach is Best-Self Management, an evidence-inspired strategy for cultivating world-class managers and transforming organizations by unlocking every employee's potential.

related_products.short_desc: Eliminate the stress and complexity of HR administration for you and your employees.
related_products.features: Zenefits is a SaaS cloud-based HR platform that helps small and mid-sized companies empower their workforce, manage change and stay compliant. Zenefits' People Platform delivers the most comprehensive, intuitive HR experience in the market. Its HR, Benefits, Payroll and Performance apps combine with advisory services and integrated partner apps to radically simplify HR administration  reducing paperwork and complexity so companies can focus on starting, running and growing their businesses.

related_products.short_desc: The BEST Workforce Management, HR & Employee scheduling solution that helps organizations manage shifts, payroll, leaves, overtime etc
related_products.features: UKG/Kronos Workforce Ready is a human capital management suite of tools on a single unified cloud platform that helps you manage the entire employee lifecycle from pre-hire to retire. Solutions for HR, recruiting, onboarding, time tracking, payroll, and more are easily accessed through a single intuitive interface. Automated and scalable tools provide a single source of truth with common reporting, dashboards, and robust workflows. Included self-service and mobile app allow easy, anytime access.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based HCM platform bringing together payroll, time + attendance, and HR for organisations with between 500 and 50,000 employees.
related_products.features: Dayforce is a global HCM platform that transforms the employee experience. It unifies data from across the entire employee lifecycle to enable better decision-making at every level. Dayforce is a comprehensive cloud platform that combines HR, payroll, workforce management and talent management in a single application. Our scalable platform is built with a single, flexible rules engine combined with real-time updates and calculations that help address complex regulatory requirements.

related_products.short_desc: WebHR is everyone's favorite and a global leader in Cloud HR - Helps you manage the most important asset in your company - your People!
related_products.features: WebHR is revolutionizing the way HR works. WebHR is a Social all-in-one Cloud based HR Software for Small & Medium Enterprises that handles everything from Hire to Retire, in the most innovate way. WebHR not only saves money to the companies, but also boosts productivity, saves space and make inter and intra-office communications fast, reliable and more efficient. WebHR assists in managing a companys most important asset - its People.

related_products.short_desc: Empower and ignite your workforce to live to their fullest potential with Namely's comprehensive HR platform.
related_products.features: Your people are your best assets. A comprehensive HR platform like Namely empowers and ignites your workforce to live to their fullest potential. Simplify your assessment cycles, collect 360 feedback, while aligning on and tracking employee goals and competencies. It doesn't stop with performance reviews-recognize great work all year around with appreciations in the Namely news feed.

similar_products.short_desc: The award-winning BambooHR Performance Management makes performance reviews a pain-free experience.
similar_products.features: The award-winning BambooHR Performance Management makes performance reviews a pain-free experience by modernizing the review process and focusing on a continuous feedback approach. Discover the new way of doing Performance Management by utilizing multiple review cycles, custom questions, employee-specific goals, confidential feedback, impromptu assessments, and reporting that provides powerful, real-time insights into your top performers, struggling employees, and employee/manager misalignments.

similar_products.short_desc: Painless Performance Reviews! PerformYard is simple and flexible for HR and a snap for employees.
similar_products.features: Top performance management software for companies with 50 to 1000 employees - PerformYard is simple and flexible for HR and a snap for employees. Recreate your existing review process online or build out a new performance management strategy. This software supports continuous feedback, 360 reviews, annual reviews, project based reviews, recognition, client feedback, and any other feedback. All your employee assessments now live in one place. Support is always free and unlimited.

similar_products.short_desc: Learn how leading midsize companies motivate and engage employees with online performance management software. See a free demo today!
similar_products.features: Motivate and engage employees with Trakstar's performance management software. Unlimited online performance reviews, automated workflows and reports. Manage performance reviews easily across hundreds or thousands of employees in your organization. Learn how leading mid size companies use Trakstar to increase employee engagement, streamline goal management and create an environment of real-time feedback to drive business growth. See a free demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: Lean how leading mid size companies complete more employee reviews with Reviewsnap. Automate & simplify the performance review process.
similar_products.features: Complete more employee reviews with Reviewsnap's performance management software. Eliminate paperwork and save time with easy to use online tools. Manage performance reviews easily across hundreds or thousands of employees in your organization. Get up and running in 48 hours. Learn how leading mid size companies use Reviewsnap to enhance employee communication, morale, productivity and develop a culture focused on high performance. See a free demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: We give HR a simplified, automated workflow to easily set-up and analyze performance reviews.
similar_products.features: ClearCompany is the easiest way to bring all of your employee performance review processes into a single, automated solution. ClearCompany's easy-to-use performance review software allows you to quickly set up reviews, including custom scoring tables, weighted sections, and free-form responses. ClearCompany's flat-rate pricing model allows you to send as many performance reviews as you need, as frequently as you need to, without worrying about the price tag.

similar_products.short_desc: Lattice is the way engaged, high-performing teams do performance management and appraisals to build a winning culture.
similar_products.features: Lattice integrates performance appraisals with continuous management tools into a people management platform that gives People Leaders solutions to build engaged, high-performing teams. They empower HR teams to make more strategic, data-driven decisions and build winning cultures. Find out why over 1,850+ companies trust Lattice for people management. Schedule a demo at Lattice.com.

similar_products.short_desc: From fast-growing start-ups to the Fortune 500, Culture Amp is designed to help build an employee experience your people will love.
similar_products.features: With Culture Amp, prioritize and deliver impactful programs across performance management, employee engagement, and development - all in one intuitive platform. By leveraging science-backed goal/OKR tracking, 1-on-1 templates, built-in calibrations, and 360? feedback, you can create a performance review process that supports managers and employees. Discover how 6,000+ companies, including Salesforce, Unilever, and PwC use our trusted data, tools, and partnership to build high-performing teams.

similar_products.short_desc: Performance Management Software that engages employees and embraces your organization's core values.
similar_products.features: Performance management software to help people reach their fullest potential by improving appreciation, coaching, and evaluation inside an organization.   Software features include Recognition, 9-Box Leadership Succession Tool, Goal Management, 360-Degree Feedback, Check-Ins, Engagement Surveys, and Performance Reviews.

similar_products.short_desc: bob's performance management gives you everything you need: streamlined 360-degree feedback, valuable insights, and actionable goals.
similar_products.features:
Managing performance reviews in bob generates data that provides valuable insights about your employees, managers, and your teams. This data enables you to track their progress and address any issues and concerns early.
Plus, you can easily set up new performance cycles within bob, customize them per site, and define which team members (no matter their location) will be part of the cycle.

similar_products.short_desc: The First Multi-Channel Performance Management Platform OKR for your hard to reach non-desk based employees without downloading an App.
similar_products.features:
StaffCircle provides an advanced but easy to use mobile friendly Performance Management and 360 Agile Appraisal system for any size of Organisation. 

Unify and improve 2-way Internal performance with easy and quick 360 Appraisals using mobile or web. Objectives OKR can be set by the user or Manager. Managers and users can request quick One2One Reviews. Add self Appraisals or 180, 270, 360 to your Performance Reviews and then link to Awards, Rewards or even career progression.

similar_products.short_desc: ChartHop is a new People Analytics platform, bringing disparate sources of people data together in a dynamic, visual, & actionable way.
similar_products.features:
ChartHop is a new People Analytics platform, bringing disparate sources of people data together in a dynamic, visual, & actionable way.

Unlike legacy People Analytics solutions, ChartHop is designed to be used by the whole organization. 

Now, HR and people managers alike can have the insights they need to make real-time strategic decisions about their organizations. This helps companies improve organizational health, drive alignment and accountability, and save money.

similar_products.short_desc: Define success for your organization and connect employees to your purpose with a continuous performance management tool.
similar_products.features: Ensuring that your people support your most important KPIs can be challenging. However, the right performance management software makes it easier to define success for your organization and connect employees to your mission. Cornerstone Performance provides you with tools to align your people and business strategy. Rich insights into your talent landscape allow you to quickly identify and mobilize employees for your organization's top priorities.

similar_products.short_desc: WebHR is everyone's favorite and a global leader in Cloud HR - Helps you manage the most important asset in your company - your People!
similar_products.features: WebHR is revolutionizing the way HR works. WebHR is a Social all-in-one Cloud based HR Software for Small & Medium Enterprises that handles everything from Hire to Retire, in the most innovate way. WebHR not only saves money to the companies, but also boosts productivity, saves space and make inter and intra-office communications fast, reliable and more efficient. WebHR assists in managing a companys most important asset - its People.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top 360 Degree Feedback software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of 360 Degree Feedback tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: 360 Degree Feedback software is designed to help human resource departments gather all-around information about an employee. Unlike performance assessment software, 360 Degree Feedback applications allow organizations to collect information not only from superiors but also from peers and subordinates, as well as clients. The information collected can be used either for assessment or training purposes. 360 Degree Feedback software is related to Performance Appraisal software, Survey software and Human Resource software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Recognition software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Recognition tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Recognition solutions assist with keeping employees feeling engaged and appreciated at work. This software facilitates peer recognition on corporate and team discussion boards, administration of awards and loyalty programs, as well as extensive reporting and analytics. Employee Recognition software is related to HR software and Talent Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mentoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mentoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mentoring software streamlines administration of corporate mentoring programs, including matching mentors to mentees, conducting surveys, and tracking mentees' progress.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Talent Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Talent Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Talent Management software gives employers the tools to accurately manage, evaluate, and compensate based on employee performance. By tracking performance and standards, Talent Management software allows companies to create and maintain a high-performance workforce. Key features of this type of software include employee learning, compensation evaluations, policy compliance, and succession planning, all of which help companies manage personnel growth. Directories related to Talent Management software are Human Resource software, Performance Appraisal software, Succession Planning software, Training software, Workforce Management software, and Applicant Tracking software.
